clinical_study.brief_title: Erbium Chromium: YSGG Laser Effect on Surgical Treatment of Chronic Periodontitis
clinical_study.official_title: Microbiological and Clinical Assessments of Erbium Chromium: YSGG Laser as an Adjunctive to Surgical Treatment of Chronic Periodontitis (Randomized Clinical Trial)

brief_summary.textblock: Microbiological and Clinical assessment of Er,Cr:YSGG laser in conjunction to open flap debridement (OFD) in treatment of chronic periodontitis through real time PCR assay for quantification of total bacterial load.

detailed_description.textblock:
Two groups are randomly allocated (random number generation) by Microsoft excel into two groups :
1. Group (1) Open Flap debridement (OFD) surgery after conventional periodontal therapy (Scaling &Curettage and root planing) combined by Er,Cr:YSGG Laser assisted pocket therapy (ELAPT) which will be applied to pocket epithelial lining and root surface.
2. Group (2) Open Flap debridement (OFD) surgery after conventional periodontal therapy (Scaling &Curettage and root planing) will be performed.

primary_outcome.description: Visual Analog Score for plaque for detection amount of plaque accumulation so assess patient oral hygiene. recording is based on both soft and mineralized debris. Each surface will have a score from 0 to 3. 0: no plaque plaque only detected by probe. Moderate deposits detected by naked eye. heavy deposits detected by naked eye.

primary_outcome.measure: Clinical Assessment of Gingival index(GI) to assess gingival inflammation. 0: normal gingiva. 1: mild inflammation . 2: moderate inflammation . 3: sever inflammation marked redness and edema and spontaneous bleeding.
primary_outcome.description: Visual Analog Score for gingival inflammation
measured by milli meters for detection of level of periodontal destruction.

primary_outcome.measure: Clinical Assessment of Clinical attachment level (CAL) .
primary_outcome.description: measured by milli meters for detection of level of periodontal destruction.
measured by milli meters for detection of level of apical migration of gingival attachment.

primary_outcome.measure: Clinical Assessment of Modified sulcular bleeding index (MSBI)
primary_outcome.description: Visual Analog Score of bleeding for detection of inflammatory status level. Modified Sulcus Bleeding Index(MSBI) 0 = No bleeding on bleeding. =pin pointed bleeding. = linear bleeding. = Heavy or profuse bleeding.

secondary_outcome.measure: Microbiological assessment through real time PCR assay for quantification of total bacterial load by universal probe and primer set (16sr RNA)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients are diagnosed to have chronic periodontitis, having infrabony posterior periodontal pocket measuring 5 mm or more.
- female or male.
- 25 - 55 years.
- Medically controlled according to medical coding of review of systems .
- Patient without history of drug administration in last month .
Exclusion criteria:
- Tobacco smoking.
- Pregnancy.
- Patients not follow periodontal hygienic instructions.
- Patients under any medication that affect periodontal healing.
- The presence of any systemic disease that affect periodontal healing.
